body.name: IKIFLY Smart Toilet Bidet with Auto Open/Close Lid, Modern Toilet with Bidet Built in, One Piece Toilet Bidet Combo with Auto Flush, Heated Seat, Warm Water Sprayer and Dryer, LED Display
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Auto Open/Close Lid】Smart Toilet lid opens/closes automatically via remote control and radar sensor: the lid automatically opens when you approach and closes automatically for flushing when you leave, allowing for hands-free operation; The foot sensing feature is activated by moving your foot to open the toilet lid and toilet seat

【Adjustable Cleaning Modes & Drying Temp.】IKIFLY one piece toilet includes rear/front /female/child /massage/strong/constant temp washing; The warm water has 4 level adjustable temperatures that are suitable for summer and winter; The nozzle will be self-cleaning before and after use; Our smart toilet with bidet built-in used instant heating type dryer provides warm wind to dry your body, giving you a comfortable experience

【Heated Toilet Seat】Say goodbye to the discomfort of sitting on a cold toilet seat; The temperature of the seat can be adjusted between 91.4℉ and 102.2℉, providing a cozy and luxurious experience; The seat contains nano-silver particles to provide you with a cleaner experience

【Automatic Flush & High-Efficiency Dual Flush】Modern toilet automatically performs a flush when you step away from the toilet seat; Powerful Siphonic and Jet provide 1.27GPF/1.0GPF dual flushing, bringing an efficient flush and helping reduce water usage; You can also use the remote control, side button or kick foot sensor to control flush

【More Humanized Design】The automatic air deodorizer neutralizes bathroom odors by using filters, effectively cleaning the air around the electric toilet; The LED display screen can monitor various data in real-time; The built-in night lights illuminate the toilet bowl, making it easier to use during nighttime; The built-in backup battery can flush during power outage

productInformation.value: #234,241 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #75 in One-Piece Toilets

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comfort and Hygiene Humanized Washing Design Multiple Washing Modes: Rear/front /female/child /massage/strong/constant temp washing; Water temperature and wash pressure adjustment: 4 levels; Self-cleaning Nozzle: The nozzle is self-cleaning before and after use, more hygienic. Care for Your Skin Warm Air Dryer 4-speed adjustable wind temperature for fast drying, the warm wind drives away the discomfort caused by the wet while reducing the use of toilet paper. Warm and Cozy Adjustable Heated Seat Ergonomic Japanese SIAA certified seat, 4 levels of temperature adjustment, enjoy the warmth in all directions. Clean and Comfortable Instant Warm Water The high-quality heating tube instantly heats water within one second and ensures that the water continues to be warm at your desired temperature for a longer period of time. Hands-free Auto Open/Close Lid ● Approach--Auto open lid--Sit seat--Off-seat leave--Auto flush+Close seat and lid ● Approach--Auto open lid--Foot kick open seat--Foot kick flush+Close seat and lid

Foot Kick Flush & Off-seat Flush Foot Kick Flush - The modern toilet is equipped with a foot-sensing flushing function that eliminates the need to bend down and is specially designed for men.Off-seat Flush - When the seat sensor no longer detects the user, it will flush automatically, freeing your hands. Soft Close & Night Light Soft Close - Quiet and slow close reduces friction and collision, It creates a quiet and harmonious night.Night Light - LED smart night light, perfect for children, the elderly, or anyone who needs to use the bathroom in the middle of the night.LED Display - Monitor various data in real-time.

MORE HUMANIZED DESIGN Auto Deodorization Auto deodorization helps reduce bathroom odors during the use of the smart toilet and keeps your bathroom clean and fresh. Microcrystalline Glazing Tech The microcrystalline glazing technology ensures smooth glaze, prevents the adhesion of dirt, and makes cleaning easier. Health & Hygienic Seat The toilet bidet seat contains nano-silver particles to provide you with a cleaner and healthier experience. Blackout Flush The one piece toilet has a built-in backup battery, so you don’t have to worry about being unable to flush during a power outage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for your money
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely beautiful if you can say that about a toilet. I love the design and it's worth every penny. It's easy to maintain it clean due to the flushing system. I highly recommend it.
